onboarding.categories.description: News are sorted in categories. Find everything organized and read about the subjects that interest you most.
onboarding.categories.title: Find what matters to you
onboarding.editorial.description: Get the main message of news within seconds. Summaries are carefully written by our staff.
onboarding.editorial.title: News Summaries
onboarding.highlights.description: Find the top news of the day, ordered by the social media relevancy. If it's being talked about, it matters.
onboarding.highlights.title: Top News
onboarding.publishers.description: Focus on what matters and do not waste time reading the same news several times. If you want, find the publication of your favorite publisher.
onboarding.publishers.title: Keep focused
onboarding.welcome.description:
Your reading time well spent.
Read the news that really matters.
onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to
